snippet: The two-time Olympic shot-put medalist John Godina and the 1996 triple jump champion Kenny Harrison were chosen for the National Track & Field Hall of Fame.
abstract: Two-time Olympic shot-put medalist John Godina and 1996 triple jump champion Kenny Harrison are chosen among other inductees for the National Track & Field Hall of Fame.
lead_paragraph: The two-time Olympic shot-put medalist John Godina and the 1996 triple jump champion Kenny Harrison were chosen for the National Track & Field Hall of Fame.

headline.main: Five Added to Track & Field Hall of Fame
